ProjectTitle: Unraveling the pathology of the novel congenital myasthenic syndrome-22 (CMS22) and investigation of molecular links with Prader-Willi syndrome.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/07/2022
7. Data sharing
You say nothing about where/how you will share image data, sequencing data and digital data resulting from the image analyses. You could have a look for suitable repositories: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/bioimaging_data and https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases or use KULeuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
